text: Diggu boi!! Tere saath jo orientation main samay bitaya tha was epic. Yaad hai apan PE group main bhi saath the jahan ek saatve senator ki hi baatein hoti thi xD. Ajayraj jitna bhi bada chuhiya ho but I'm grateful I got to meet people like you through him. Keep radiating happiness with your smile. Also humari daaru party due hai so we HAVE to meet.
author: Deepak  Pant

text:
Yes treat treat remember remember :-P
Also agli baar "Sports bar" jaao to zyada lookout le jana. Har baar thode pehchan ke log achanak milenge hall pahuchane ke liye xD
author: Deepak  Pant

text:
Sir ko gareeb ka pranam. I knew we would vibe with each other when both of us agreed to the fact that Ajayraj is a chatora xD. Aakhri do mahine main jo wild party animal dekhne ko mila mazza hi aa gaya. Umeed hai aapse fir milenge is choti si duniya main.
Also I know ki mast aadmi kaun nahi hai (iykwim)
author: Deepak  Pant

text: An @$$ that just won't quit. (Yes that's what you are <3)
author: Deepak  Pant

text: Duniya main pehle insaan mila who is so good at taking bua jokes, it's like you never liked her much anyway xD. Apna sasta Sake session was also amazing. All the best future IAS, jameen vivad hua to main tera hi number ghumaunga sambhal liyo.
author: Deepak  Pant

text: Hi, hot mess! (salivating emoji). I haveseen you transform from an uptight nerd to a slightly less uptight bum :-P. Mujhe yaad hai jab hum second year ki bsbe class main mil the. Mana ki maine tujhe tang karne ki koi opportunity kabhi nahi chodi par yaar usme apna hi ek alag mazza tha. Cut to the next year aur hum saath mil ke aur logon ke mazze le rahe hote the. I have always admired the fact that tu itna outspoken hai about your passion for science and how you want to do great things. I honestly think tere chances of getting a "Nobel prize" are much higher than mine (waise mere bhi koi bahut ache prospects nahi hai xD). Tension kam liya kar yaar tu tabadtod banda hai. Baaki they don't call you BSBE gawd for nothing. Stay in touch bhai!
author: Deepak  Pant
